about_the_game:
In Harmony Overture, there was once a world that was split into two half's, the top half known as Caesura and the bottom half known as Legato. Caesura has banned all music while Legato stayed alive by thriving on music. However the people of Caesura didn't enjoy that fact and are trying their very best to stop Legato from spreading their music. Play as Melody, the leader of a band known as Forte, fight back against monster, bandits, and the troops of Caesura and rise to the top and bring back music and harmony to the entire world!


Features

DELVE THROUGH THE DUNGEONS OF THE UTOPIC UNDERGROUND


• Explore a bullet hell game of different harmonies and chords where music is your weapon and soul.

• Interact, Fight, Dash, and Dodge your enemies attacks in this top-down 2D dungeon environments

• Use a variety of different instrumental weapons that can be found by interacting with the environment!.

• Experience unique story and dialogue with surreal voice


Make your voice and music be heard in Harmony Overture

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Sound Card: Apple officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Xcode. Targeting Apple Silicon with IL2CPP scripting backend requires macOS Catalina 10.15.4 and Xcode 12.2 or newer.

name: Harmony Overture

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Visual Studio 2015 with C++ Tools component or later and Windows 10 SDK.

short_description: When the world has gone silent, music finds a way. But when there is harmony there is discord. Interact, Fight, Dash, and Dodge your way through the dungeons filled with discourse and calamity to bring harmony back to your utopia.
